de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.game
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.app.Application
      com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
          de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.system.SystemListener
public class Game
extends com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication

Visual-Computing Praktikum - Aufgabe 2

Actual implementation of the SimpleApplication class provided by the jMonkeyEngine

This class contains all the game logic

Author:
Bernd Spaeth, Wladimir Spindler and Saman Sedighi Rad
